description:
Fully functional one week trial!

Does not seem to work on Verizon :(

Send and receive over 500 different animated emoticons in 10 different categories to phones that support MMS. From sports to animals and holidays, there are cute little animated characters for every occasion! 

This app allows you to save your favorites, so that you can access them quickly, without searching. 

The animations work on Palm WebOS 1.4 or later phones and on iPhones... & maybe more.

Visit us at clearwaterapps.wordpress.com
